ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Oh, there you are! I was hoping I’d see you today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2101_01_10: There’s something I wanna give you.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2101_02_10: It’s not much, but I’m sure it’ll come in handy.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I’ve got a present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2102_02_10: It might come in clutch when you least expect it.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I’ve prepared something just for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2103_02_10: I’ll be happy if helps you.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2103_03_10: Let’s build each other up and get stronger!
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2201_01_10: So, what do you want to talk about?
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
Do you have any stories to share,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
There’re so many things I wanna talk about with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2302_01_10: You’re giving this to me? I’ll happily take it!
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2301_01_10: What a surprise! This is exactly what I wanted!
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2402_01_10: Thanks for chatting with me. See ya!
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
I had a lot of fun. Thanks for talking to me about
so many different things.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I hope we can have fun together again,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
When I’m here, I get to learn new things from all
the different Trainers. It’s super helpful.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
It’s not so bad taking it slow and relaxing here
once in a while.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
If I’m going to put myself in front of people more,
I should step up my style.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8002_0701_02_10: Champions, like Diantha, aren’t just strong...
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
They and their Pokémon both have sophisticated
auras. I wish I could be like those Trainers.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
Those four are my precious friends who
adventured around Kalos with me.
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
But they’ve all been making lots of new friends
on Pasio...
ch0003_00_calme_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
I can’t lose to them. If Shauna’s going to make a
hundred friends, I’ll make two hundred!
